DeployR Doc Nursery

Version 8.1.0
  • Nursery Holding Area
    • Config Variable Values

Config Variable Values


Open Edition name: DeployR Open
Enterprise Edition name: DeployR Enterprise
Company name: Microsoft Corporation


Server log file: catalina.out Check diagnostic bundles to see if this is filename for both win and lin.

SUPPORTED OS PLATFORMS:

CentOS / RHEL: ` <br/>SLES:SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 (SP2)<br/>Windows:Windows Server 2008 (R2 SP1), 2012`

EXPERIMENTAL PLATFORMS:

openSUSE: OpenSUSE 13.1
UBUNTU: Ubuntu 12.04, 14.04
OS X: Mac OS X Mavericks (10.9), Yosemite (10.10)
Windows: Windows 7.0 (SP1), 8.1, 10

DEPLOYR LINUX

Linux Paths


Non-root install dir: /home/deployr-user/deployr/8.1.0
Non-root download dir: /home/deployr-user/deployrdownload

Enterprise Edition


Linux Enterprise tar file: DeployR-Enterprise-Linux-8.1.0.tar.gz
Linux Enterprise script: installDeployREnterprise.sh

Open Edition


Linux Open tar file: DeployR-Open-Linux-8.1.0.tar.gz
Linux Open script: installDeployROpen.sh

DEPLOYR OS X


OS X tar file: DeployR-Open-OSX-8.1.0.tar.gz

DEPLOYR WINDOWS

Window Paths


Path to Server install: C:\Program Files\Microsoft\DeployR\8.1\
Path to Node Install: NONE DEFINED - PATH IS SAME AS MAIN SERVER ??
Path to external directories: C:/Program Files/Microsoft/DeployR/8.1/deployr/external/data/

Enterprise Edition


Windows Enterprise EXE: DeployR-Enterprise-8.1.0.exe
Windows Enterprise Node EXE: DeployR-Enterprise-Node-8.1.0.exe

Open Edition


Windows Open EXE: DeployR-Open-8.1.0.exe
No node exe for Open

Tomcat


Tomcat path: C:\Program Files\Microsoft\DeployR\8.1\Apache_Tomcat
Tomcat service name: Apache-Tomcat-for-DeployR-8.1

RRO, RRE & R

OPEN R


Minimum R version: v3.1.x, 3.2.x

RRO


RRO name and version: Revolution R Open v8.0.x, 3.2.x

RRE


Name and version: Microsoft R Services 8.1
Short name: <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rreshort" was not found.</strong></span>
Install Dir: <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_install_dir" was not found.</strong></span>
Install Guide: <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_installmanual" was not found.</strong></span>

Install Filenames:

  • <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_rhel5" was not found.</strong></span>
  • <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_rhel6" was not found.</strong></span>
  • <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_sles" was not found.</strong></span>


RRE Uninstall script: <span class="text-danger"><strong>The configuration property "rre_uninstall" was not found.</strong></span>

PORT NUMBERS


8100 (Default Tomcat port)
8101 Tomcat HTTPS port
8102 Tomcat shutdown
8104 (Rserve connection port)
8105 RServe cancel port
8106 DeployR event console port

PATH TO DOCUMENTS


Download url: /download/
Upgrade url: http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=698525
Path to admin help: /documents/help/admin-console/
Path to repoman help: /documents/help/repo-man/
